Word of Airports

This program pulls data about airports from a Cloudant database and displays their location in a simple list, sorted by distance.

The user shall provide a lat/lon point and a radius. The retrieved airports will be within the user provided radius.

Missing features

  • exception handling (e.g: DB not available)
  • negative radius value handling
  • invalid input character handling (e.g: latitude contains any letter)
  • page among airport search results
Packages 
Package Description
airports.base
Implements basic classes
airports.db
Establishes connection with Cloudant account and database
airports.ui
Handles interactions between user and software.
